features: CETAPHIL DAILY FACIAL CLEANSER: Reinforces the skin barrier, balances skin and minimizes the appearance of pores
IDEAL FOR SENSITIVE, COMBINATION TO OILY SKIN: Clinically proven to deep clean by removing dirt, excess oils, impurities and pollution microparticles
DEVELOPED FOR EVEN THE MOST SENSITIVE SKIN: The hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic formula is free of parabens and sulfates
DEFENDS AGAINST 5 SIGNS OF SKIN SENSITIVITY: Dryness, irritation, roughness, tightness and a weakened skin barrier
body.description: Step up your skincare regime with CETAPHIL Daily Facial Cleanser, a deep cleansing, gentle foaming formula designed for sensitive, combination skin. Ideal for daily use, this cleanser gently yet effectively removes dirt, excess oils, impurities and pollution microparticles, without leaving the skin dry or tight. Formulated with a new blend of key ingredients: hydrating glycerin, panthenol (vitamin B5) to hydrate, soothe and preserve the skin barrier, and niacinamide (vitamin B3) to help smooth skin texture and retain skin moisture barrier. CETAPHIL Daily Facial Cleanser minimizes the appearance of pores without stripping the skin of its natural oils and moisture barrier, helping to defend against 5 signs of skin sensitivity. Clinically proven to be suitable for sensitive skin, this gentle cleansing formula is hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic, and free of parabens and sulfates.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this for a while and it has been doing me good. I like the very subtle scent of it. Keeps my face clean. It does not break me out

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 🧼💖 "Sensitive Skin’s BFF: Cetaphil Daily Facial Cleanser Review" 💖🧼
reviews.reviewText: TLDR: 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 Cetaphil Daily Facial Cleanser - a perfect balance for sensitive, combination skin at an unbeatable price! 💆‍♀️💰On my quest for the holy grail of face washes for my oh-so-fussy sensitive-combination skin, I struck gold with Cetaphil's Daily Facial Cleanser. It's like finding a rare gem in a sea of skincare products. The new 20 oz pack? A budget-friendly miracle for anyone who values both quality and quantity.The gentle foaming magic of this cleanser is something else! Soft, soap-free, and hypoallergenic – it's like a soothing hug for your face. It lathers up just right, whisking away the day's dirt and oil without leaving my skin crying for moisture. Post-wash, my skin feels like it's been to a spa: smooth, clean, and oh-so-refreshed. 🧖‍♀️🌿And let's not forget the packaging – simple, effective, and with a pump dispenser that's as practical as it is convenient. No mess, no fuss, just the right dollop of cleanser every time.For someone who's played a long game of trial and error with skincare products, the hypoallergenic formula of this cleanser is a dream come true. No more playing Russian roulette with my skin – it's smooth sailing from here on out.Cetaphil's Daily Facial Cleanser isn't just a product; it's a skin savior for anyone juggling sensitivity and oiliness. Affordable, effective, and gentle – it ticks all the boxes. If you're on a quest for clear, happy skin without emptying your wallet, this cleanser is your knight in shining armor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels like water
reviews.reviewText: I must be used to thicker face washes because this literally came out like it was water. It works amazing though. I like to use a toner after I wash my face to make sure I got off all my makeup and sure enough, it removes all my make-up (mascara and all!) I have super duper sensitive skin and this makes my skin feel so soft. I tend to break out once a month and I feel like this helps tame that. It feels good under my makeup and with a moisturizer with no makeup. This is by far my favorite face wash. Auto ship sign me up, please because I don't ever want to be without this face wash

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Gentle Giant for Sensitive Skin
reviews.reviewText: I have been on the lookout for a face wash that caters to my sensitive yet combination skin, and I must say, the Cetaphil Daily Facial Cleanser has hit the nail on the head. With its new 20 oz packaging, it’s quite the steal for its price, making it a cost-effective choice for daily skincare.The gentle foaming action is a game-changer - it’s soft, soap-free, and hypoallergenic, which is a boon for someone with a sensitive skin type like mine. It lathers well without leaving my skin feeling stripped or tight. Instead, my skin feels smooth, clean, and refreshed post-wash. This cleanser manages to remove the day’s grime and excess oil efficiently while still being gentle on the skin.I’m also a fan of the simplistic yet functional packaging. The pump dispenser is a nice touch, making it easy to use and ensuring that I get the right amount of product each time.The hypoallergenic formula ensures that my skin doesn’t react adversely to the cleanser, which has been a common issue with other products I’ve tried in the past. It’s evident that this product is formulated keeping in mind the varying needs of sensitive to oily skin types.The Cetaphil Daily Facial Cleanser is a reliable and gentle choice for anyone looking to maintain a clear and healthy complexion without breaking the bank. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Gentle and Effective Cleanser for Sensitive Skin!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the Cetaphil Face Wash for a while now, and I'm incredibly impressed with its performance. As someone with sensitive and combination to oily skin, finding the right facial cleanser has always been a challenge. However, this new 20 oz version has been a game-changer for my skincare routine.The gentle foaming action of this cleanser effectively removes impurities and excess oil without leaving my skin feeling tight or stripped. It strikes the perfect balance between deep cleansing and maintaining my skin's natural moisture barrier.The fact that it's soap-free and hypoallergenic is a major plus for those with sensitive skin like mine. I've experienced no irritation or redness after using this face wash, which is a relief.The generous 20 oz size is fantastic and ensures that I won't run out too quickly. The pump dispenser makes it easy to get just the right amount of product without any mess.Overall, the Cetaphil Face Wash has become a staple in my skincare routine. It's a dependable cleanser that caters to sensitive and combination to oily skin types, providing a refreshing and effective cleanse. If you're on the hunt for a reliable facial cleanser that won't compromise your skin's balance, I highly recommend giving this one a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: This facewash has been great for my sensitive skin. The formula is gentle and foams nice. This takes off my make-up with ease and does not dry out my face. I would recommend this facewash to anyone! Will certainly be buying again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is a great cleanser for every skin, very light and cleans well, no perfumes, been using it for years it is definitely a great product for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "Soothing Cleanser for Happy Skin!"
reviews.reviewText: The Cetaphil Face Wash, Daily Facial Cleanser, has been a staple in my skincare routine for years, and the new 20 oz size is a bonus! As someone with sensitive and combination skin, finding the right cleanser has always been a struggle until I found this gem. The gentle foaming action feels refreshing without stripping my skin's natural moisture. It effectively removes impurities and excess oil without causing any irritation or dryness. The hypoallergenic formula is a game-changer for those with sensitive skin. Whether it's morning or night, this cleanser leaves my face feeling clean, balanced, and ready for the next steps in my skincare regimen. Highly recommend it for anyone seeking a reliable, gentle, and effective daily cleanser!
Me llegó solo una botella que no debería se ser 3
